milestones.title: One year FullStack Developer Bootcamp 'MEGAK'
milestones.description: MEGAK it is one year back end bootcamp which will include JavaScript, Node, Express, MongoDB, TypeScript, React and full stack project with participation of software house guests.'

milestones.title: One year IT Bootcamp 'Studiuje IT'
milestones.description: Studiuje IT is one year IT bootcamp to cover all IT topics starting from Math for programmers, basics of the most popular programmin laguages, databese, computer architectures, Law in IT etc.
